Class UserAuthController

java.lang.Object
sg.edu.ntu.sc2002.ay2425.fcsdGroup2.controller.UserAuthController
public class UserAuthController extends Object
Controller class handling user authentication. Manages login, logout, password change, and session validation operations.

      Returns:
